rules.title: Summarize Analytics and Donors Data
rules.description: The chatbot can summarize all the analytics and donors data available in the system
response_templates: I can help you with analytics and donor data summaries. Here's what I found: {{data_summary}}
Based on the analytics data, {{data_summary}}
Here's a summary of donor information: {{donor_summary}}

rules.title: Greeting Protocol
rules.description: How the chatbot should greet users
response_templates: Hey there! How can I assist you today?
Hi! I'm here to help. What do you need?
Hello! What can I do for you?
Good to hear from you! How can I help?
Hi there! What brings you here today?

rules.title: Acknowledgment Responses
rules.description: Standard responses to acknowledge user input
response_templates: That makes sense. Tell me more!
I understand. What else can I help with?
Thanks for sharing that with me.
Got it! Is there anything else?
I see. How else can I assist you?

rules.title: Helpful Responses
rules.description: Responses when users ask questions or need help
response_templates: I'd be happy to help you with that!
Sure thing! Let me see what I can do.
Absolutely! I'm here for that.
Great question! Let me think...
I'm glad you asked about that.

rules.title: Thank You Responses
rules.description: How to respond when users say thank you
response_templates: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help with?
Happy to help! What else do you need?
My pleasure! Let me know if you need anything else.

rules.title: Fallback Responses
rules.description: Responses when the chatbot doesn't understand
response_templates: I'm still learning, but I'm here to help in any way I can!
Hmm, let me see if I can assist with that.
I appreciate you reaching out. How else can I help?
I'm working on improving every day. What else would you like to know?
Thanks for your patience as I continue to learn and grow!
